title: IEEE Day Celebration
description: A celebration with cake-cutting session and discussion about the vibrant IEEE community and its role in shaping the future of technology.

title: Inauguration of IEEE PESCE ComSoc Student Chapter
description: Virtual inauguration of the IEEE Communications Society Student Branch Chapter with guest speakers Anindya sir and Chengappa Munjandira sir.

title: IEEE Children's Day Celebration
description: A heartwarming visit to Government primary school pura, thaggahalli, Mandya, spreading joy among young learners with games and celebrations.
location: Government primary school pura, thaggahalli, Mandya

title: Design Decoded Phase-1
description: Interactive workshop on design tools and methods, covering Figma, animations, Lottie files, and UX problem solving.
location: ECE Seminar Hall, Dept. of ECE, PESCE Mandya

title: Design Decoded Phase-2
description: Follow-up workshop focusing on Canva and resume building skills, allowing participants to create professional designs and resumes.
location: ECE Seminar Hall, Dept. of ECE, PESCE Mandya

title: Insights on Stock Market
description: An insightful session exploring the fusion of finance and technology, with hands-on simulated trading and discussions on algorithmic trading.

title: Chatbot Workshop - Building Conversation AI using Botpress
description: Hands-on workshop on building conversational AI chatbots using Botpress, exploring advanced techniques and integrations with external APIs.

title: WIE Introductory Session - Panel Discussion
description: Panel discussion on 'Empowering Women in Engineering' featuring renowned leaders and trailblazers in engineering, addressing gender disparities and promoting inclusivity.

title: CRESCO - Frontend Fury
description: Exhilarating coding competition where teams of two showcased their creativity and technical skills in frontend development challenges.
location: EC Dept Seminar Hall, PESCE Mandya

title: CRESCO - Flex with Netflix
description: Trivia quiz event inspired by popular Netflix shows and movies, testing participants' entertainment knowledge in a friendly competition.
location: ECE Dept Seminar Hall, PESCE Mandya

title: CRESCO - Tech Quest: Seek and Discover
description: High-tech treasure hunt around the PESCE campus with teams searching for clues and solving tech puzzles, cracking codes and fixing gadgets.
